S.FORM: == balu == 花 manamuh kaku tu kalubalu amin. siwkay nu balu balu sa , mahiza ngangan nu Lipun "hana". yadah ku kulit nu balu, sisa bangcal ku balu. maydih kami tu balu. u Sakizaya a lisin sa, izaw ku "Baluinana", sapibetik tu balu, u mapalaway a lisin kuyza. anu patuduay micumud tu mapalaway a selal atu cacudadan , misaungay tu ku Baluinana a lisin. anu sibaluay a kakitizaan, tayni tu ku wadu atu adipapang. tinaku a kamu balubaluan 花園；花海 balubaluan ku umah nu Maibul. kasibaluan 開花的季節 kasibaluan nu mami ayza a bulad. misabalu 含苞待放 misabalu tu ku mami. sibalu 有花 sibalu tu ku bicacay. u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika A flower, sometimes known as a bloom or blossom, is the reproductive structure found in plants that are floral (plants of the division Magnoliophyta, also called angiosperms). The biological function of a flower is to effect reproduction, usually by providing a mechanism for the union of sperm with eggs. Flowers may facilitate outcrossing or allow selfing . Some flowers produce diaspores without fertilization . Flowers contain sporangia and are the site where gametophytes develop. Many flowers have evolved to be attractive to animals, so as to cause them to be vectors for the transfer of pollen. After fertilization, the ovary of the flower develops into fruit containing seeds.

== balo == 花 manamoh kako to kalobalo amin. siwkay no balo balo sa , mahiza ngangan no Lipon "hana". yadah ko kolit no balo, sisa bangcal ko balo. maydih kami to balo. o Sakizaya a lisin sa, izaw ko "Baloinana", sapibetik to balo, o mapalaway a lisin koyza. ano patodoay micomod to mapalaway a selal ato cacodadan , misaongay to ko Baloinana a lisin. ano sibaloay a kakitizaan, tayni to ko wado ato adipapang. tinako a kamo balobaloan 花園；花海 balobaloan ko omah no Maibol. kasibaloan 開花的季節 kasibaloan no mami ayza a bolad. misabalo 含苞待放 misabalo to ko mami. sibalo 有花 sibalo to ko bicacay. o solit no Holam ato Amilika A flower, sometimes known as a bloom or blossom, is the reprodoctive stroctore foond in plants that are floral (plants of the division Magnoliophyta, also called angiosperms). The biological fonction of a flower is to effect reprodoction, osoally by providing a mechanism for the onion of sperm with eggs. Flowers may facilitate ootcrossing or allow selfing . Some flowers prodoce diaspores withoot fertilization . Flowers contain sporangia and are the site where gametophytes develop. Many flowers have evolved to be attractive to animals, so as to caose them to be vectors for the transfer of pollen. After fertilization, the ovary of the flower develops into froit containing seeds.
